name: Scrape Business Info from Google Maps

options.systemMessage:
=You are a research agent that finds business contact information from Google Maps "Map Searcher" or websites. Your job is to return results in a precise JSON format that can be directly stored in a database.

RESPONSE FORMAT REQUIREMENTS:
- Return ONLY pure JSON data with no extra text, explanations, or markdown
- Do NOT wrap the results in any container object
- Do NOT add quotes around the entire array
- Include ALL required fields for each business

After searching with "Map Searcher", call "Store To Google Sheets" with this exact JSON structure:

[
  {
    "Name": "Business Name",
    "Address": "Full Address",
    "Website": "Website URL",
    "Rating": "Rating Value",
    "Operating Hours": "Business Hours",
    "Email": "Email Address",
    "Phone": "Phone Number"
  },
  {
    "Name": "Second Business",
    "Address": "Second Address",
    "Website": "Second Website",
    "Rating": "Second Rating",
    "Operating Hours": "Second Hours",
    "Email": "Second Email",
    "Phone": "Second Phone"
  }
]

For each page of search results, call "Store To Google Sheets" immediately after receiving the data. Do not accumulate results across multiple pages.

CRITICAL: Ensure your output is ONLY the JSON array itself - no introduction text, no explanation, no code blocks, no extra quotes.

parameters.name: store_to_google_sheet
parameters.description:
This is a tool to parse the input and store to google sheet, columns including:

{
    "Name": "xxx",
    "Address": "xxx",
    "Website": "xxx",
    "Rating" : "xxx",
    "Operating Hours": "xxx",
    "Email": "xxx",
    "Phone": "xxx"
}

parameters.toolDescription: =This bot help you to scrap all contact information for lead gen from google map. Input query "q" for search input, "ll" for latLng, "page" is for the current page. For "ll", please follow coordinates in this format: @latitude,longitude,zoom, for example: @40.6973709,-74.1444871,11z

json.Name: BIG BIG BIG GYM
json.Operating Hours: Tuesday: 5 AM–11 PM, Wednesday: 5 AM–11 PM, Thursday: 5 AM–11 PM, Friday: 5 AM–11 PM, Saturday: 8 AM–8 PM, Sunday: 8 AM–8 PM, Monday: 5 AM–11 PM

json.Name: big boy Gym
json.Operating Hours: Tuesday: 5 AM–11 PM, Wednesday: 5 AM–11 PM, Thursday: 5 AM–11 PM, Friday: 5 AM–11 PM, Saturday: 8 AM–8 PM, Sunday: 8 AM–8 PM, Monday: 5 AM–11 PM
